name: All good in bad
description: The game is about the nice part of someone and the negative part of the person. They are in conflict because they think that just one of them should exist in the person's world. So they compete between them to have a winner but at the end they should work together. The message of this game is that Good and evil form the whole, both complement each other in a perfect balance. If there is no evil, there is no good; we cannot say that something is right if we do not have a base or a point of reference, if we do not know what is wrong
